title: You’ll find little or no avalanche risk at these 4 backcountry ski touring spots
description: Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradual slopes on trails that serve as easy hikes in the summer.
content: Backcountry skiing means different things to different people. For some it means climbing hundreds of feet up beautiful peaks on pristine slopes in search of powder turns, which requires advanced ski… [+4972 chars]
de: An diesen 4 Backcountry-Skitourengebieten besteht kaum oder gar keine Lawinengefahr. Beim Backcountry-Skitourengehen geht es um deutlich flachere Hänge auf Wegen, die im Sommer als leichte Wanderungen dienen.
en: You’ll find little or no avalanche risk at these 4 backcountry ski touring spots. Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradual slopes on trails that serve as easy hikes in the summer.
la: Minimum aut nullum avalanche periculum invenies in his 4 scopis ski maculis variandis. Backcountry ski touring means traveling on much more gradal slopes on calles that serve as easy hikes in summer.

title: RAI: Italy avalanche kills two Finns
description: Rescuers located the victims using tracking devices, but they were already dead.
content:
Two Finns, between the ages of 50 and 60, have died in an avalanche in northern Italy, according to Italian public broadcaster RAI.
The accident occurred on Thursday afternoon near the Solda ski res… [+482 chars]

en: RAI: Italy avalanche kills two Finns. Rescuers located the victims using tracking devices, but they were already dead.
la: RAI: Italia NIVIS CASUS duos Finnos necat. Salutores victimarum vestigandis machinas collocaverunt utentes, sed iam mortui erant.

title: 13 skiers, climbers and hikers died in Italian mountains in a week as avalanches plague region
description: A record 13 backcountry skiers, climbers, and hikers have died in the Italian mountains over the last week, rescuers said Monday.
content: MILAN A record 13 backcountry skiers, climbers, and hikers have died in the Italian mountains over the last week, rescuers said Monday, including 10 in avalanches triggered by an exceptionally unstab… [+2467 chars]
de: 13 Skifahrer, Kletterer und Wanderer starben in einer Woche in den italienischen Bergen, als Lawinen die Region heimsuchten. Eine Rekordzahl von 13 Backcountry-Skifahrern, Kletterern und Wanderern ist in der letzten Woche in den italienischen Bergen gestorben, teilten Retter am Montag mit.
en: 13 skiers, climbers and hikers died in Italian mountains in a week as avalanches plague region. A record 13 backcountry skiers, climbers, and hikers have died in the Italian mountains over the last week, rescuers said Monday.
la: XIII skiers, viverra tellus et hikers mortui sunt in montibus Italiae in septimana sicut avalanches plaga regionis. Recordum 13 incolarum nautarum, viverra tellus, et hikers in montibus Italiae proximis hebdomade mortui sunt, salvatores Lunae dicti.

title: Two skiiers dead following avalanches in French Alps
description: The incidents occurred just two days after two skiiers were killed in an avalanche near the village of Saint-Veran.
content:
AVALANCHES KILLED TWO skiers in the French Alps today, authorities have confirmed, following the deaths of two off-piste tourers in a separate slide at the weekend.
A 38-year-old man was killed in S… [+771 chars]
de: Zwei Skifahrer sind bei Lawinenabgängen in den französischen Alpen ums Leben gekommen. Die Vorfälle ereigneten sich nur zwei Tage, nachdem in der Nähe des Dorfes Saint-Véran zwei Skifahrer bei einer Lawine ums Leben gekommen waren.
en: Two skiiers dead following avalanches in French Alps. The incidents occurred just two days after two skiiers were killed in an avalanche near the village of Saint-Veran.
la: Duo nautae mortui sequuntur avalanches in Alpibus Gallicis. Eventum est duobus diebus post duos nautas in NIVIS prope villam Saint-Veran caesi sunt.

title: 13 people died in Italian mountains over last week as Olympics start
description: Fresh snowfall during recent storms and wind-swept snowcaps on weak internal layers have created especially risky conditions, rescuers said.
content: A record 13 backcountry skiers, climbers and hikers have died in the Italian mountains over the last week, rescuers said Monday, including 10 in avalanches triggered by an exceptionally unstable snow… [+2456 chars]
de: 13 Menschen starben letzte Woche zu Beginn der Olympischen Spiele in den italienischen Bergen. Neuschneefälle während der jüngsten Stürme und windgepeitschte Schneekappen auf schwachen Innenschichten haben laut Rettern besonders riskante Bedingungen geschaffen.
en: 13 people died in Italian mountains over last week as Olympics start. Fresh snowfall during recent storms and wind-swept snowcaps on weak internal layers have created especially risky conditions, rescuers said.
la: 13 homines in montibus Italiae proximis octo sicut Olympia incipiunt mortui sunt. Nives recentes inter recentes procellas et ventosas nives de infirmis stratis internis in condiciones periculosas praesertim creaverunt, salvatores dixerunt.

title: Avalanches in Italy kill three in Winter Olympics regions
description: Avalanches have killed three people skiing off-piste in the mountains of Trentino Alto Adige and Lombardy, two regions that are home to some of the venues of the Winter Olympic Games, the Alpine rescue service said.
content: Avalanches have killed three people skiing off-piste in the mountains of Trentino Alto Adige and Lombardy, two regions that are home to some of the venues of the Winter Olympic Games, the Alpine resc… [+1491 chars]
de: Lawinen in Italien töten drei Menschen in Regionen der Olympischen Winterspiele. Lawinen haben drei Menschen beim Skifahren abseits der Pisten in den Bergen des Trentino-Südtirol und der Lombardei getötet, zwei Regionen, in denen einige der Austragungsorte der Olympischen Winterspiele liegen, teilte der Alpenrettungsdienst mit.
en: Avalanches in Italy kill three in Winter Olympics regions. Avalanches have killed three people skiing off-piste in the mountains of Trentino Alto Adige and Lombardy, two regions that are home to some of the venues of the Winter Olympic Games, the Alpine rescue service said.
la: Avalanches in Italia tria Olympia hiemali regiones necant. Avalanches tres homines skiing off-piste in montibus Trentino Alto Athesis et Lombardiae occiderunt, duas regiones quae domi sunt aliquibus ex venues Olympiae hiemalis, in Alpino servitio liberare dixerunt.

title: Volunteers buried face-down in snow to test avalanche survival backpack
description: The SBX backpack system from Safeback is designed to pull and deliver oxygen from snow if the wearer is buried by an avalanche, thus increasing their survival time. A group of intrepid volunteers has now proven how well the system works.Continue ReadingCatego…
content: The SBX backpack system from Safeback is designed to pull and deliver oxygen from snow if the wearer is buried by an avalanche, thus increasing their survival time. A group of intrepid volunteers has… [+3358 chars]
de: Freiwillige vergruben sich verdeckt im Schnee, um den Lawinen-Überlebensrucksack zu testen. Das SBX-Rucksacksystem von Safeback ist darauf ausgelegt, Sauerstoff aus dem Schnee zu ziehen und abzugeben, wenn der Träger von einer Lawine verschüttet wird, und so seine Überlebenszeit zu verlängern. Eine Gruppe unerschrockener Freiwilliger hat nun bewiesen, wie gut das System funktioniert.WeiterlesenKategorie…
en: Volunteers buried face-down in snow to test avalanche survival backpack. The SBX backpack system from Safeback is designed to pull and deliver oxygen from snow if the wearer is buried by an avalanche, thus increasing their survival time. A group of intrepid volunteers has now proven how well the system works.Continue ReadingCatego…
la: Voluntarii in nive sepulti facie-descenderunt ut experirentur NIVIS dorsualis superesset. SBX systema sacci dorsualis e Safeback ordinatur ad evellendum et liberandum oxygenium ex nive, si velatus ab NIVIS sepelitur, ita tempus superesset augens. Coetus voluntariorum intrepidorum nunc probetur quam bene ratio operata sit.Continue ReadingCatego…

title: 2 skiers dead as avalanche rocks Italian alps site near 2026 Winter Olympics
description: Valtellina, Italy, is a major hub for the 2026 games, with men's alpine skiing, ski mountaineering, freestyle skiing and snowboarding all happening nearby.
content:
Two skiers have died in an avalanche that happened near the site of the Winter Olympics in the Italian alps on Saturday, local authorities said.
Fire and rescue officials said a serious avalanche ac… [+1017 chars]
de: Zwei Skifahrer kamen ums Leben, als eine Lawine nahe den Olympischen Winterspielen 2026 ein Gelände in den italienischen Alpen erschütterte. Valtellina, Italien, ist ein wichtiger Knotenpunkt für die Spiele 2026. Alpin-Skifahren, Skibergsteigen, Freestyle-Skifahren und Snowboarden für Herren finden alle in der Nähe statt.
en: 2 skiers dead as avalanche rocks Italian alps site near 2026 Winter Olympics. Valtellina, Italy, is a major hub for the 2026 games, with men's alpine skiing, ski mountaineering, freestyle skiing and snowboarding all happening nearby.
la: 2 Nartatores mortui sunt sicut NIVIS saxa Alpium Italiae iuxta 2026 Olympia hiemalia situs. Valtellina, Italia, centrum maior est pro viginti 2026 ludis, cum skilingi montani, ski montani, libero stilo ski et Duis omnibus prope contiguis.
